title: Don't know why I'm asking for this...
body:
But, I've noticed that we have a Steel Legion for Garen and Lux...

Can we have a Steel Legion skin for Quinn and/or Jarvan 4?

Also/Or, can we have a commando skin for Quinn?

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/a27ba318d94526a7fe31df7ef149a160.jpg

Artwork not by me... person responsible is someone else.

replies.body: I think Valor needs sunglasses to really complete the look.
Can they be Kamina style glasses?
Super Galaxy {{champion:68}} might take offence, but I would totally be down with it anyway.
Oops forgot he had them already.

We need a Super Galaxy Garen skin Where he wears Simon's glasses from the later episodes,

Call it "Garen Laggin'"

I'm still hoping for the Vanguard Darius and Noxian Garen sideswap skins. 

Darius with Demacian lines and a cleaner cut, Garen who's starting to come around to Kats way of thinking

Garen: BLOOD FOR NOXUS

Darius: Uh.... What?
How about PROJECT: Quinn?
that sounds pretty cool.

It is. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/JOeeFePR-project-quinn-skin-idea
Or Renegade Quinn?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ShadowStorm,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5qxEq0c8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-11T17:55:46.449+0000)
>
> I think Valor needs sunglasses to really complete the look.

Agreed but aviator goggles instead. :)
Nope.  Can't be a commando if you don't have sunglasses.
Aviator Shades
would that give double protection from leona?
She even looks like a Catachan, right at home with the ~~Imperial Guard~~ Commando skin line.
That is a really nice piece of work. Really top notch. Professional quality.

Commando Batch 2

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ol08ml4ut10/U3AZX9AEmEI/AAAAAAAAAbY/eqjtU8pOmlg/s1600/CommandoZed.jpg
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/28b15619b829326e70754368edda5f92.jpg
http://img00.deviantart.net/06d1/i/2013/012/6/6/jungle_heimerdinger_by_he_st-d5ra8b9.jpg

(Demacia had a recruitment drive.)
Commando Jinx

I totally forgot!

http://i.imgur.com/ROioO2D.jpg
She can get a Halloween skin where Valor is a bat and she is in a Bat costume...if you know what i am referring to.
BATWOMAN
lovin that artwork <3
Well how about we pretend that commando lux never happened, and replace it with this instead?
Because we can have them do what they did to the Witch Lux splash to her Commando splash and have this for twice the fun?
Did someone just troll my post by down voting everyone? That's not only wrong, that's mean.
Also, Bilgewater Quinn. Rito, pls!

I've always wondered why they didn't do Commando Quinn as a release skin or a skin that came out not long after release. I mean The Commando Skin line is so well defined, and is specifically for Demacian Champs, that I've been a bit frustrated that Riot hasn't done it yet. I mean Come ON it's so freaking EASY. Green colored suit similar to lux's with a visor around her eyes, Bald Eagle Valor with aviator goggles (optional) and you've got a machismo Quinn Skin that fits into a defined skin line that hasn't been used or touched on for YEARS.
Well, Imean, the Debonair skins were Piltover-only for a while but then Galio got one
Galio fits Piltovers theme pretty well though. I mean, he's very poke-ish in gameplay, and is a sentient in-animate object.
He does, I won't deny that. Unless this has been changed by the Great Retcon, tho, Galio is a Demacian
true, Galio is still demacian, but he fits Piltover's theme well enough that he fit the debonair line.
I agree
I believe Galio was made in Piltover, but followed Poppy to Demacia and just stayed there to protect.
It's possible, I don't clearly remember all of the lore so you might be right about that
That eagle doe. MURICA!

FOR 'MURICA.
Pls Rito - Quinn is my favorite champion.

I'd love to see these types of skins on her.
I see her more of a vigilante - so maybe some really cool skins like the Project: Quinn and Commando Quinn with Valor being like a jungle parrot to emphasize the guerilla style look. :D

I'm just spewing ideas out of excitement.
Yasssss, In all seriousness Quinn needs another skin :o
Mecha Quinn! When she ults she physically transforms into a Jet instead of swapping with Valor!

Steel Legion or PROJECT:Quinn

http://i.imgur.com/x3yzOS4.jpg

I'd rather they actually fix Quinn's bugs and lower her ult cd so you can actually pick her sometimes as a counterpick without her E flipping you the opposite direction of where you should be before I spend any money on a skin for her.  I bought her bundle at launch and had fun for 2 hours before I realized my mistake lol.  She's a visually impressive champion with a unique playstyle yet she's not allowed to be usable apparently.

> [{quoted}](name=Ireliateyou,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5qxEq0c8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-11T18:29:18.366+0000)
>
> I'd rather they actually fix Quinn's bugs and lower her ult cd so you can actually pick her sometimes as a counterpick without her E flipping you the opposite direction of where you should be before I spend any money on a skin for her.  I bought her bundle at launch and had fun for 2 hours before I realized my mistake lol.  She's a visually impressive champion with a unique playstyle yet she's not allowed to be usable apparently.

Different departments mate. You CAN actually have both. *mindblown*

> [{quoted}](name=Archeanthus,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5qxEq0c8,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-06-11T21:56:08.128+0000)
>
> Different departments mate. You CAN actually have both. *mindblown*

Yea, I'm totally aware of that.  Doesn't change the fact that skin appeal and champion viability go hand in hand.  Some people buy expensive skins for champions they're only going to play once just because they like the skin, though I'm not one of those players.  And leaving a champion in a broken state for 3 years when their problems are simple to fix is ridiculous.  So no I'm actually not getting both so I will complain about it when the context is appropriate.
At the very LEAST, Fix her AA Animations pls
The commando skin line was discontinued. Sorry but not happening.
quinn is going commando? hue
That's more "Commando" than "Steel Legion" if you ask me....
they said so ...
